title: You can easily try Android 13’s new Material You styles with this app [Gallery]
content:
Android 13’s second developer preview adds a handful of new Material You styles, but they’re not very easy to access at this point. Barely a week later, though, the fun app Repainter has added support for Android 13’s new Material You styles.

more…

The post You can easily try Android 13’s new Material You styles with this app [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The fun app Repainter has added support for Android 13's new Material You colors, offering easy access to "Expressive" and other palettes.
